mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FIELD_I18N ( F_OWNER_FIELD_ID, F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID, F_FORMAT, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ ownerFieldId }, #{ targetLocaleId }, #{ format }, #{ title }, #{ description }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FIELD_I18N SET F_FORMAT = #{ format }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_OWNER_FIELD_ID = #{ ownerFieldId } AND F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_OWNER_FIELD_ID AS "ownerFieldId", T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID AS "targetLocaleId", T1.F_FORMAT AS "format", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T2.F_FIELD_NAME AS "_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T2.F_FIELD_NAME AS "owner_title", T4.F_TITLE AS "target_title" FROM T_FIELD_I18N T1 LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_FIELD_ID = T2.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T2.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_LOCALE T4 ON T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = T4.F_LOCALE_ID WHERE T1.F_OWNER_FIELD_ID = #{ ownerFieldId } AND T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FIELD_I18N T1

SELECT T1.F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", T1.F_TYPE AS "type", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_SCALE AS "scale", T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", T1.F_PK AS "pk", T1.F_NULLABLE AS "nullable", T1.F_NEEDS_SUM AS "needsSum", T1.F_NEEDS_AVG AS "needsAvg", T1.F_NEEDS_MAX AS "needsMax", T1.F_NEEDS_MIN AS "needsMin", T1.F_IS_CONTAINER AS "isContainer", T1.F_FORMAT AS "format", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T3.F_TITLE || ')' AS "cref_title", T4.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T4.F_TITLE || ')' AS "eref_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fref_title", T7.F_VALUE_ID AS "type_title" FROM T_FIELD T1 LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T2.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T4 ON T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID = T4.F_ENUM_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T7 ON T7.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 1 AND T1.F_TYPE = T7.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_FIELD_ID = #{ ownerFieldId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F_FIELD_ID) AS "maxFieldId", MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FIELD T1
T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_LOCALE_ID AS "localeId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_LOCALE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LOCALE T1
T1.F_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'
